title.rendered: Targeted Emails: Training & Best Practices Webinar

content.rendered:
Targeted Emails helps your team build vibrant, engaging emails for students and employers. Check out the recording below for a walkthrough of Targeted Emails, best practices to up-level your email marketing, and early details on future product updates.

More Targeted Emails resources

Here are the resources we shared during the webinar:

  • Targeted Emails walkthrough help article
  • Haverford Targeted Emails case study
  • “How to write great emails” blog post
  • Rutgers: Enhancing Activations webinar
  • DePaul: Marketing to Students webinar
View all career center webinars

excerpt.rendered: Review a walkthrough of Targeted Emails, best practices to up-level your email marketing, and early details on future product updates.
